title: Lightning Push the Avalanche to Game 6 in the Stanley Cup Finals
description: The Tampa Bay Lightning stymied the Colorado Avalanche in Game 5 of the Stanley Cup Finals to send the series back to Florida.
dc:creator: Ken Belson
media:credit: Mark J. Rebilas/USA Today Sports, via Reuters
media:description: Ondrej Palat (No. 18) of the Tampa Bay Lightning celebrating with Steven Stamkos after scoring a third-period goal.
